title: StarMine Analyst Awards: Deutsche Bank analysts recognized
body:
Deutsche Bank analysts have earned recognition in the StarMine Analyst Awards 2019 from Refinitiv in Australia and New Zealand.
Adrian Allbon, Food, Beverages & Tobacco ranked No. 1 and Craig Wong-Pan, Diversified Industrials ranked No.2 in the Top Earnings Estimators category. Mark Wilson ranked No.1 as Top Stock Pickers in Chemicals & Forest Products.
Joe Liew, Deutsche Bank’s Head of Equity Research APAC said: “These recognitions are a strong endorsement of the work we do to highlight long-term investment opportunities for our clients. They also recognise the consistent investment we make in our research franchise and underscore the value we place on delivering high quality, timely and thought-leading analysis. We are particularly proud that these awards once again confirm the high calibre of analysts we have in one of our key Asia Pacific markets.”
The StarMine Analyst Awards, formerly known as the StarMine Awards, are globally recognized as the gold standard in objective measurement of sell-side analyst performance. The awards recognize the world's top individual sell-side analysts and firms. They can also be used by buy-side firms to identify the leading analysts at sell-side firms.
The StarMine Analyst Awards from Refinitiv measure the performance of sell-side analysts based on the returns of their buy and sell recommendations relative to industry benchmarks; and the accuracy of their earnings estimates in 15 regions across the globe.
